intro_text: You wake up in a forest. Shadowy trees hang overhead, and you feel eyes on you despite not seeing anyone around.

success_text.unscathed_common: You swerve around, just as a cat lunges from the shadows and aims their claws at your pelt. Ducking at just the right moment, you manage to avoid their swipe.
success_text.unscathed_rare: You swerve around, just as a cat lunges from the shadows and aims their claws at your pelt. Ducking at just the right moment, you manage to avoid their swipe and launch a counterattack. With a shriek of pain, they skitter back into the shadows.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You swerve around, just as a cat lunges from the shadows. You don't react quickly enough and they pin you down, hissing that you have a lot more training to do.
fail_text.death: You whip around, just as a cat lunges from the shadows. You don't react quickly enough and their claws sink into your neck. It seems like you won't be waking up this time.

decline_text: With a shake of your head, you manage to wake yourself up, sitting up in your nest with a gasp.

intro_text: A skilled warrior of the past offers to train you in a dream. However, their methods seem harsh and cruel and their pelt drips with an unknown muck.

success_text.unscathed_common: You accept the training and, despite the harsh methods, manage to learn some valuable skills.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You accept the training, but after a while of sparring, the warrior growls that you aren't strong enough.

decline_text: You decline the training, deciding not to submit to such harsh methods.

intro_text: A group of ghostly cats approach you with an offer to learn a forgotten prophecy, but at the price of bringing a message back to the living.

success_text.unscathed_common: You agree to their terms and upon waking, you relay the message to your clan's medicine cat along with the prophecy.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You agree to their terms, but upon waking, you find that you can't remember the message they asked you to deliver.

decline_text: Unsure of their intentions, you decline their offer and quickly leave.

intro_text: You discover a hidden section of the Dark Forest, filled with echoes of old battles.

success_text.unscathed_common: You decide to explore the area and manage to uncover hidden wisdom from past battles that might help your clan in the future.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You venture into the area, but it only leads to disturbing visions of past battles that leave you disoriented upon waking.

decline_text: Feeling it might bring unnecessary trouble, you decide to leave the hidden area untouched.

intro_text: You find a cat trapped in the Dark Forest during a dream. Stars glitter in their pelt, shimmering against the muck of the shadows. They're scared and don't know the way out.

success_text.unscathed_common: You guide the cat through the eerie forest, successfully leading them out. They wake up grateful for your help.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Despite your best efforts, you lead them in circles. You wake up, trying to rid the memory of the starry cat's terrified expression from your mind.

decline_text: You reassure the cat that this is only a dream and they'll wake up soon, leaving them to find their own way.

intro_text: While walking through the Dark Forest, you slip, falling into a river of inky black water.

success_text.unscathed_common: You stay calm, holding your breath and treading water until you reach the surface again.

fail_text.death: It's no use. You can't tell which way is up or down, and fall deeper into the depths.

decline_text: You gasp, waking up in your nest. That was a horrible dream.

intro_text: There's a familiar scent in the air. You track it down and find yourself face to face with... one of your clanmates? They look lost.

success_text.unscathed_common: You convince them that this is no place for a cat like them.
success_text.unscathed_rare: You take them on as your apprentice.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Another Dark Forest cat leaps between you two, hissing at you not to involve yourself with the new apprentices.

decline_text: You gasp, waking up in your nest.
